Uses of Package
org.eclipse.gef.handles

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.gef.handles 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.gef.handles
    This package provide several common handle implementations.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.gef.handles used by org.eclipse.gef.handles 
    Class and Description
    AbstractHandle
    Base implementation for handles.
    BendpointHandle
    A handle for bendpoints on a connection.
    ConnectionEndpointHandle
    A handle used at the start or end of the Connection.
    ConnectionHandle
    The base implementation for handles used with editparts whose figure is a Connection.
    CornerTriangleBorder
    Deprecated. 
    this class is no longer used
    MoveHandle
    A Handle used for moving GraphicalEditParts.
    SquareHandle
    A small square handle approximately 7x7 pixels in size, that is either black or white.
